root.name: MetalHeart: Replicants Rampage
root.description: OverviewWhen a space ship crashes with only the captain pilot surviving, they must now explore the planet Protion in order to survive. Using a large gaming world with a turn-based combat system cyberpunk theme for this post-apocalyptic RPG from Russian developer Akella. Player can fill their party with a variety of humans, mutants, cyborgs nomads.
